div.p: Estimated Travel Expenses: - Travel expenses are estimated and are subject to change based on actual travel expenses incurred.

Travel expenses are on a direct reimbursement basis and include all expenses for transportation, accommodation and meals. Whenever possible trips are combined with other business and expenses are divided to reduce the total cost for all of our customers.

Customer further acknowledges and agrees that Primus Auditing Ops' liability is limited only to audit work performed by it, and the parties expressly acknowledge that Primus Auditing Ops is not liable for Customer's commodity, its safety, or quality.

6. RIGHT TO REFERRAL. Customer acknowledges that Primus Auditing Ops is, or may, contract out the auditing services performed for Customer. Independent auditors agree by a separate referral agreement to obtain his/her own insurance coverage and furnish a copy of the certificate of insurance to Primus Auditing Ops. 7. TERM AND TERMINATION. This Agreement, and its terms, shall continue in effect until such time as it is terminated by Customer or Primus Auditing Ops, as provided for below. Representations, warranties, and any corresponding obligations thereto, made in the course of this Agreement shall continue beyond termination.
Termination for Cause. If either party fails to fulfill any term or condition of this Agreement, such failure shall constitute a breach of this Agreement by that party. In such a circumstance, the non-breaching party shall provide, by regular mail, written notice to the breaching party and include a sufficient description of the relevant conduct in violation of this Agreement. The breaching party shall have 15 days from the date the notice is mailed to cure the breach and come into compliance with the terms of this Agreement. If, after 15 days, the breaching party has not cured the breach, the non-breaching party may immediately terminate this Agreement with no further obligations by providing written notice of termination.
Voluntary Termination. Either party may voluntarily terminate this Agreement upon fifteen days' written notice to the other party. If this Agreement is terminated by Customer, any ongoing assessments made by Primus Auditing Ops shall immediately be considered void and of no effect.
Termination by Customer After Desktop Review Portion of Audit. If Customer voluntarily terminates this Agreement in accordance with Section 8.b. above, but after Primus Auditing Ops has begun the desktop review portion of the audit, Customer acknowledges and agrees that it shall be responsible for, and, upon termination, shall immediately pay to Primus Auditing Ops, an amount equal to ONE-THIRD (1/3) of the Audit Fee indicated in the “Audit Fee/Total Services” box on page 1 of this Agreement. Failure on Customer's behalf to pay said amount is a material breach of this Agreement by Customer.
8. BILLING. The Customer agrees to pay Primus Auditing Ops within 30 days of billing.
